tools.name: three_create_scene
tools.description: 创建一个新的Three.js场景。Create a new Three.js scene.

background.description: 场景背景颜色（十六进制格式，如'#000000'）。Scene background color in hex format (e.g., '#000000').

fog.description: 场景雾效配置。Scene fog configuration.

type.description: 雾效类型：'linear'（线性雾）或'exponential'（指数雾）。Fog type: 'linear' or 'exponential'.

color.description: 雾的颜色（十六进制格式）。Fog color in hex format.

near.description: 线性雾的起始距离。Linear fog near distance.

far.description: 线性雾的结束距离或指数雾的密度。Linear fog far distance or exponential fog density.

tools.name: three_add_object_to_scene
tools.description: 向场景添加对象。Add an object to a scene.

sceneId.description: 场景ID（由three_create_scene返回）。Scene ID (returned by three_create_scene).

objectId.description: 对象ID（由对象创建工具返回）。Object ID (returned by object creation tools).

tools.name: three_remove_object_from_scene
tools.description: 从场景移除对象。Remove an object from a scene.

tools.name: three_get_scene_objects
tools.description: 获取场景中所有对象的列表。Get a list of all objects in a scene.

tools.name: three_set_scene_background
tools.description: 设置场景背景。Set the scene background.

oneOf.description: 背景颜色（十六进制格式）。Background color in hex format.
纹理ID（由纹理创建工具返回）。Texture ID (returned by texture creation tools).

tools.name: three_export_scene_json
tools.description: 导出场景为JSON格式。Export scene to JSON format.
